EmailTemplate.description: Our buyers are waiting for your next vehicle
EmailTemplate.name: Run List 2.0 Sellers - v1
EmailTemplate.subject: Hey there, did you see tonight's Run List lineup?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there! Just reaching out to remind you that cars are running today on our daily Run List at 6 pm EST.
With our revamped Run List 2.0, you'll find that these cars are priced to sell and I wanted to make sure that you donâ€™t miss out. Give the run list a look and set your proxy bids beforehand!
If you have any questions or feedback, shoot me an email or give me a call. I'm here to help!
Thanks! {!Contact.IST_Account_Manager__c}
